text: From dystopia to the deep blue sea. Divergent's Shailene Woodley and Hunger Games star Sam Claflin's latest romance, Adrift, is a journey of love, survival, and seat - gripping suspense. Or perhaps, more precisely, what Titanic might've panned out like were Nicholas Sparks ever to scribe a novelization in a similar vein. The film, based on the true tale of real - life ocean enthusiasts Tami Oldham and Richard Sharp in 1983, chronicles the duo's harrowing brush with Hurricane Raymond, one of the most disastrous hurricanes ever to be documented.
